Listing as 'most successful team' is not exactly clear, whereas 'most championships won' is direct and factual; e.g. Germany has the most 1st, 2nd, & 3rd placings combined
/* Records and statistics */ brazil qualifying for every contest
for German flag, please see talk page; for Italy, until the new champion is crowned, Italy are still the current champion even when they have no chance to retain title
Date maintenance tags and general fixes: build 422:
/* Results */ add note on successor teams
/* Performances by host nations */ South Africa failed to advance.
in each group of 4 they play 3 games against every other team in the group - so round-robin not swiss-style
/* Results */ nothing to put here for nearly three weeks
/* Final tournament */ in which each team is scheduled for three matches against other teams in the same group.
/* Final tournament */ Group stage is a Swiss-style tournament, not a round-robin, since each team does not play all other teams in its group
/* Final tournament */ use lettering scheme from FIFA regulations to show hierarchy of ranking methods
/* Final tournament */ tie-breakers are in a particular order, so numbered here
Trying again to revert to cleaner version
